question: The Mets won their first World Series in 1969. Who did they beat?
Which of these pitchers never pitched a no-hitter?
Which 1969 Miracle Met earned another World Series ring as a coach on the 1986 Mets?
Who won the World Series MVP for the Mets in 1986?
feedback: Ray Knight won the World Series MVP Award while Keith Hernandez won the NL First Baseman Gold Glove and Gary Carter, NL Catcher Silver Slugger Award

question: Before Jacob deGrom won it in 2014, who was the last Met pitcher to win the NL Rookie of the Year?
feedback: While all these pitchers won NL Rookie of the year, Gooden was the most recent, in 1984.

question: How many numbers (excluding Jackie Robinson's) have the Mets retired?
feedback: Tom Seaver, Gil Hodges, Casey Stengel and Mike Piazza
